roleset.name: to provoke, stir up
roleset.note: AROUSE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from arouse.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: When the hacker moved , [Mr. Stoll]*-4 moved too , calling up other systems managers to alert them but keeping his own system open to avoid [*-4]arousing suspicion .

example.name: inanimate causer
example.text: `` My impression is that there is n't anything which [*T*-1] arouses our interest at first glance , '' says [*T*-2]an official from Japan 's Ministry of International Trade and Industry .

roleset.name: able to be awakened, stirred up
roleset.note: AROUSABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. Relation to arouse.01 (from arousable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: *PRO* Sleepy but arousable , reporting mild - to - moderate post-operative pain .
